definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: I realized I did not want to talk to Bertrand. What could I say to him?
sentences.chinese: 我意識到我不想和伯特蘭說話。我能和他說什麼呢？

sentences.english: A Hollywood actress once met the British  philosopher, Bertrand Russell.
sentences.chinese: 一位好萊塢女明星遇見了英國哲學家伯特蘭羅素。
